head.title: Covid-19 Update - Community Consolidated School District 146

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

a.title: Go to Community Consolidated School District 146

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

nav.div: Community Consolidated School District 146 » District Information » News » What's New » Covid-19 Update

div.img:
District 146 and its schools will be closed for the remainder of the school year per the Governor’s order in response to the COVID-19 epidemic. Remote learning will continue.
Please read this letter (Spanish version, Arabic version) from Superintendent Dr. Jeff Stawick which details changes to the previously announced closure.
The District will be offering to go breakfast and lunch pick-up on Mondays and Wednesdays throughout the closure
